## Gompertz growth

```{r simulating data}
a = 15
b= 1.5
c = 0.15
timeindex=1:100
gompertz_growth = a*exp(-exp(b-c*timeindex)) + rnorm(100,0,1)
plot(timeindex,gompertz_growth)
data = list(T=100,y=gompertz_growth)
```

Objective: Fit in JAGS the Gompertz model corresponding to this simulated dataset.
